txt.en: Radagast has called upon you to visit his home of Rhosgobel. While it is not certain what matters currently trouble Radagast, it is not often that he directly seeks you out for assistance. What ever the matter may be, it is surely to be important! You should seek travel to Rhosgobel as soon as you are able.
Radagast has summoned you to his home of Rhosgobel for matters of importance.
Rhosgobel can be found in Laerlad, in the Vales of Anduin.\n\nYou should travel to Rhosgobel.
'Ah, [placeholder], just the [placeholder] that I was hoping to see. I have need of your assistance.'
Rhosgobel can be found in the eaves of the Mirkwood, next to the Vales of Anduin.\n\nYou should travel to Rhosgobel.
Radagast can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should talk to Radagast.
Rhosgobel can be found in Laerlad, in the Vales of Anduin.\n\nYou should travel to Rhosgobel.
